sentences.english: The knee extensors being much stronger than the flexors is one of the characters of the human skeletal muscles.
sentences.chinese: 伸膝肌遠較屈膝肌強大是人類骨骼肌的特徵之一。

sentences.english: The upper third of the esophagus is marked by skeletal muscle.
sentences.chinese: 食管上段有明顯的骨骼肌。

sentences.english: The muscle you gain is minuscule compared with the total amount of skeletal muscle in the body.
sentences.chinese: 你獲得的肌肉相對於全身的骨骼肌來說只是一小部分。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the different characteristics of skeletal muscle ultrastructure after conventional chemical and cryo-fixation.
sentences.chinese: 比較冷凍和化學固定後骨骼肌超微結構的不同特徵。

sentences.english: Ship the eyes and 500g each of liver and skeletal muscle.
sentences.chinese: 運送眼睛及各500克的肝臟和骨骼肌。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of the electric stimulation on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究電刺激對失神經支配骨骼肌萎縮的影響。

sentences.english: Left anterior tibialis muscle was harvested to measure ATP in the skeletal muscle cells.
sentences.chinese: 取左脛前肌標本分別作骨骼肌肌細胞ATP測定。

sentences.english: The attached skeletal muscle is involved by invasive carcinoma by direct extension.
sentences.chinese: 附屬的骨骼肌被浸潤性癌累犯，直接擴散。

sentences.english: Objective Investigate the influence of skeletal muscle shrinkage on osteoporosis in ovariectomy rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨骼肌收縮對絕經後骨質疏鬆骨結構的影響。

sentences.english: Iron deficiency also influences on circulation system and skeleton muscle function.
sentences.chinese: 另外，鐵缺失還會影響循環系統和骨骼肌的功能。

sentences.english: "Skeletal muscle is so important for your health, and that's particularly true in individuals with diabetes," he explained.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼肌對健康非常重要，對糖尿病患者尤其如此。

sentences.english: There are three main proteins that make up the contractile mechanism in skeletal muscle.
sentences.chinese: 有三個主要的蛋白質彌補收縮機制，骨骼肌。

sentences.english: S100 was strongest in skeletal muscle fibers with vacuolar change.
sentences.chinese: 空泡變的骨骼肌纖維強烈表達S100。

sentences.english: The uptake and metabolism of glucose in skeletal muscle is of major significance for the blood-glucose homeostasis.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼肌內葡糖糖的攝取和代謝對血糖穩定有重要作用。

sentences.english: It also called involuntary muscle or skeletal muscle.
sentences.chinese: 它又稱爲隨意肌或骨骼肌。

sentences.english: This article aims to summarize exercise and the skeletal muscle heme oxygenase system.
sentences.chinese: 此研究擬對運動與骨骼肌血紅素加氧酶系統作以綜述。

definition: anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
